allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete public site with SEO, visual refinements, and contact map

SEO Implementation:
- Add comprehensive metadata in layout.tsx \(Open Graph, Twitter Cards\)
- Create reusable metadata utilities in src/app/\(public\)/metadata.ts
- Add dynamic sitemap.ts with static pages + meetings/news
- Add robots.ts configuration
- Add metadata to all public pages with canonical URLs

Visual Refinements:
- Update Header with real logo using Next.js Image
- Update Footer with real logo \(brightness/invert filter for dark bg\)
- Change HTML lang from "en" to "es"

Contact Page Enhancements:
- Create ContactMap component with Leaflet/React-Leaflet
- Add interactive map centered on Santiago, Chile
- Replace placeholder with real map in ContactPage

Documentation:
- Update project_status.md to reflect Phase 4 completion
- Update changelog.md with v0.3.0 changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Public pages data loading and routing

- Remove default Next.js page.tsx that was overriding public home
- Convert public pages to Server Components for reliable data loading:
  - MeetingsPage: Server-side data fetching with Prisma
  - NewsPage: Server-side data fetching with Prisma
  - ExecutivePage: Server-side data fetching with Prisma
  - LaboratoriesPage: Hybrid approach with server data + client map
- Extract LaboratoriesContent as client component for Leaflet interactivity
- Update documentation with changes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add executive member photos to Supabase Storage

- Add @supabase/supabase-js client for asset management
- Create upload-assets.ts script for uploading member photos
- Upload photos for all 4 executive committee members
- Photos now display from Supabase Storage in /executive and home page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
